attributes.action: To significantly Reduce the tax currently paid on fuel. i.e Reduce Fuel Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Government seems intent on pricing motorists off the road by increasing tax on fuel to try to reduce the CO2 emissions and hence reduce our effects on the environment.

Our nation is small in comparison with others and as such the impact that we have on the environment with our fuel use is far less than the like of the USA who have a much bigger population and there cars are monstrous compared to ours yet their fuel costs next to nothing. There environmental impact is far greater than our so who should we be penalised?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
